verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> thou unto them that <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H4480>hearts,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> their own <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H1115>nothing!<s%>
O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> like the <S%H7776>foxes<s%> in the <S%H2723>deserts.<s%>

Ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H6556>gaps,<s%> neither made <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H1447>hedge<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They have <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5002>saith:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them: and they have made others to <S%H3176>hope<s%> that they would <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H1697>word.<s%>

Have ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4236>vision,<s%> and have ye not <S%H559>spoken<s%> a <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H4738>divination,<s%> whereas ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> it; albeit <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> ye have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and that <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H3577>lies:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Because, <S%H3282><s%> even <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H2937>seduced<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace;<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and <S%H1931>one<s%> built <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H2434>wall,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> others <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> mortar:

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them which <S%H2902>daub<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> mortar, that it shall <S%H5307>fall:<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower;<s%> and <S%H859>ye,<s%> O great <S%H68>hailstones,<s%> <S%H417><s%> shall <S%H5307>fall;<s%> and a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H1234>rend<s%> it.

Lo, <S%H2009><s%> when the <S%H7023>wall<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> shall it <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H2915>daubing<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> ye have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will even <S%H1234>rend<s%> it with a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger,<s%> and great <S%H68>hailstones<s%> <S%H417><s%> in my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H3617>consume<s%> it.

So will I break <S%H2040>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> mortar, and bring it <S%H5060>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> so that the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> thereof shall be <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> and it shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and upon them that have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> mortar, and will <S%H559>say<s%> unto you, The <S%H7023>wall<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> more, <S%H369>neither<s%> they that <S%H2902>daubed<s%> it;

To wit, the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and which <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> for her, and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Likewise, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> their own <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> thou <S%H5921>against<s%> them,

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the women that <S%H8609>sew<s%> <S%H3704>pillows<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H679>armholes,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6967>stature<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H5315>souls!<s%> Will ye <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will ye save the souls <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H5315><s%> that come unto you?

And will ye <S%H2490>pollute<s%> me <S%H413>among<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and for <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> and to save the souls <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> by your <S%H3576>lying<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> your <S%H3577>lies?<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> your <S%H3704>pillows,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly,<s%> and I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H2220>arms,<s%> and will let the souls <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H6679>hunt<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> Your <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> also will I <S%H7167>tear,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to be <S%H4686>hunted;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> with <S%H8267>lies<s%> ye have made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3512>sad,<s%> whom <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> made <S%H3510>sad;<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> that he should <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> from his wicked <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H7451><s%> by promising him life: <S%H2421><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> ye shall <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H7081>divinations:<s%> for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H4480>hand:<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
